teaser: The JOLTS report, vaccinations in college, and popular wallpaper.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, Feb. 10, 2015
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

First up, what we can learn from counting the number of job postings in America. Plus, we take a look at what role schools and  colleges play in regulating vaccinations. A big issue for both is the costs of enforcement. And we're talking here about wallpaper. Yes, the stuff you painstakingly peeled from your walls over the past few decades is once again cool. 

"}]
title: PODCAST: What's old is new again
description: The JOLTS report, vaccinations in college, and popular wallpaper.
contentencoded: First up, what we can learn from counting the number of job postings in America. Plus, we take a look at what role schools and  colleges play in regulating vaccinations. A big issue for both is the costs of enforcement. And we're talking here about wallpaper. Yes, the stuff you painstakingly peeled from your walls over the past few decades is once again cool.
